@terrysimpson Flight DE2067 will depart 1705 local time and arrive in Frankfurt at 1250 the next day.
@terrysimpson right but what date?
@terrysimpson When are you scheduled to leave?
@terrysimpson You will clear customs in LHR if your itinerary ANC-FRA-LHR is on one ticket. Enjoy your flight!

Hi @marrina sorry to hear that. Tried it on our end & it worked. Did you update your browser? Still not working? Pls call 1-866-960-7915
